#include "client.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../shardmaster/client.h"

namespace janus {

int ShardKvClient::Op(function<int(uint32_t*)> func) {
  uint64_t t1 = Time::now();
  while (true) {
    uint64_t t2 = Time::now();
    if (t2 - t1 > 10000000) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    uint32_t ret = 0;
    int r1; 
    r1 = func(&ret);
    if (r1 == ETIMEDOUT || ret == KV_TIMEOUT) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 5;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    if (ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }


    if (ret == KV_NOTLEADER) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 5;
    }
  }

}

int ShardKvClient::Put(const string& k, const string& v) {

  int shard = Key2Shard(k);
  auto shardMaster = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  uint32_t status;
  ShardConfig shardConfig;

  shardMaster->Query(-1,&status,&shardConfig);
  int group = shardConfig.shard_group_map_[shard];
  int server = shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group][shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group].size()-1];

    return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(server).Put(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

ShardKvProxy& ShardKvClient::Proxy(siteid_t site_id) {
  verify(commo_);
  auto p = (ShardKvProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(site_id);
  return *p; 
}

int ShardKvClient::Append(const string& k, const string& v) {
  
  int shard = Key2Shard(k);
  auto shardMaster = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  uint32_t status;
  ShardConfig shardConfig;

  shardMaster->Query(-1,&status,&shardConfig);
  int group = shardConfig.shard_group_map_[shard];
  int server = shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group][shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group].size()-1];

  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
  return Proxy(server).Append(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

int ShardKvClient::Get(const string& k, string* v) {

  int shard = Key2Shard(k);
  auto shardMaster = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  uint32_t status;
  ShardConfig shardConfig;

  shardMaster->Query(-1,&status,&shardConfig);
  int group = shardConfig.shard_group_map_[shard];
  int server = shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group][shardConfig.group_servers_map_[group].size()-1];

  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(server).Get(GetNextOpId(), k, r, v);
  });
}

} // namesapce janus;
